General.Name: Seoul Semiconductor Co. Ltd
General.Description: Seoul Semiconductor Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells light emitting diodes (LEDs) products worldwide. The company offers high and mid power products; low power chip LEDs and through holes; chip on boards; filament LEDs; modules; nano and micro drivers; automotive products; backlighting units for TVs/monitors, notebooks/tablets/mobiles, and automotive display products; and flash LEDs. It also provides its products for lighting, backlighting unit, flash LED, and automotive applications. Seoul Semiconductor Co., Ltd. was founded in 1987 and is based in Ansan, South Korea.
